landing.explanation1: The first cases of a global pandemic have arrived in your backyard. Because the disease can be transmitted before symptoms appear, it has the potential to spread throughout the entire community—unless you take action now through physical distancing. The next 8 weeks are crucial for saving thousands of lives.
landing.explanation2: But you can’t do this alone! It’ll take the cooperation of the entire community to slow the spread of this disease. Together, you’ll have to find ways to meet your individual needs while limiting your outings as much as possible.
landing.explanation3: This game uses the decisions of 20 players—you and 19 other people who have played before—to determine how frequently people in your community leave their homes over the next 8 weeks. Each player’s choices will influence how 5% of the population behaves.
landing.explanation4: Their decisions and yours will determine how many lives are lost or saved.
landing.instruction1: To start, enter your zip code or choose a community size.
landing.instruction2: We’ll pull real data to set up the game with your community’s actual population, density, and number of available hospital beds.

errors.zipNotFound: ZIP code not found, please try a different one

decide.h1: You've been fighting the virus for
decide.h2Question: How many times will you go out this week?
decide.sliderExplanation: (1) go for a walk AND (2) buy groceries AND (3) go for a run AND (4) lunch with a friend AND (5) dinner with family AND (6) go to a house party AND (7) go to a concert
